en_US: Listen, listen. Do you have a Pokémon
called MACHOP?
Would you be willing to trade your
MACHOP for my ABRA?
Be nice to my ABRA!
I’ll be sure to look after your MACHOP
in return!

messages.en_US: What I asked for was a MACHOP...

en_US: Oh, OK...
Well, I can’t make you trade me.
But if you change your mind,
I’ll be right here waiting!
Thanks to Pokémon, I got to be
friends with you!
A Pokémon obtained in a trade grows
quickly.
But if a Pokémon grows too much, it may
ignore the Trainer.
Of course, it won’t matter if you have
lots of Gym Badges.
When you trade a Pokémon, the item it’s
holding is traded as well.
That’s pretty cool, huh?
It means you can send an item as a gift
along with your Pokémon in a trade!
